StarshipData.Name: Light Fighter
StarshipData.Description:
Fast and cheap, but fragile and low damage. Great for
early pressure and diverting the enemies attacks.

StarshipData.Name: Heavy Fighter
StarshipData.Description:
Durable frontliner. Absorbs damage well, fast-firing,
but moves slower than the Light Fighter

StarshipData.Name: Support Frigate
StarshipData.Description:
Fair health and damage, but slow to fire. Provides
healing to unit's in front of them.

StarshipData.Name: Dreadnought
StarshipData.Description:
Long-range, very high damage units. Dominates all
lanes, but very slow and expensive.

StarshipData.Name: Battleship
StarshipData.Description:
Extremely durable, with multi-lane coverage. More
health than the dreadnought, but moderate damage.

StarshipData.Name: Reaper
StarshipData.Description: Explodes on impact with an enemy starship!

StarshipData.Name: Mothership
StarshipData.Description: Your base and resource hub. Stationary, heavily armoured.
